definition: daughter of a male cousin via female line

sentences.english: Frank consults his niece, Ann, about how to handle an insect invasion.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克向他的侄女安请教如何对付昆虫的侵害。

sentences.english: Chen's three sisters and his niece came for the ceremony from Huitong county in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 陈聚志的三个姐姐和侄女特意从湖南会同县赶来。

sentences.english: I was in Beijing, accompanying my niece to school interviews.
sentences.chinese: 我在北京，陪同我侄女去参加学校面试。

sentences.english: Hi. I'm looking for a gift for my niece.
sentences.chinese: 您好，我想为我侄女挑一件礼物。

sentences.english: Yes, we must suppose the faults of the niece to have been those of the aunt;
sentences.chinese: 是的，我们必须把侄女的过错视为婶母的过错。

sentences.english: I became sensitive, I asked 6-year-old niece, "I am beautiful?"
sentences.chinese: 我变得敏感，我问6岁的小侄女“我漂亮吗？”

sentences.english: He had a little niece- Blue Flower.
sentences.chinese: 他有一个小侄女，叫蓝花。

sentences.english: Jastrow knit his brow fiercely at his niece .
sentences.chinese: 杰斯特罗狠狠地对他侄女皱起眉头。

sentences.english: They were a niece and uncle, respectively, who lived in the same house.
sentences.chinese: 他们分别是侄女和叔叔，在同一所房屋内生活。

sentences.english: I sent my niece a doll of a great grizzly bear as her birthday present.
sentences.chinese: 我送给侄女一只玩具大灰熊作为她是生日礼物。

sentences.english: Fortunately, my niece wanted to buy the car.
sentences.chinese: 正好，我的侄女想买这辆汽车。

sentences.english: Since then his niece has grown quite a bit.
sentences.chinese: 之后小侄女成长的很快。
甜美的，幸运的，被时尚淘汰的侄女。

sentences.english: They are connected with Chen's family by their niece's marriage.
sentences.chinese: 他们和陈家只不过因侄女的婚姻有亲戚关系。

sentences.english: My nephew works for a bakery…
sentences.chinese: 我侄女儿在一家玩具公司工作。

sentences.english: Carlos: Your beautiful niece working for your ex-lover.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒你漂亮的侄女为你的老情人工作。

definition: older male cousin via female line
